name: Gazlowe
title: Boss of Ratchet
description: Specialist Rule breakers and masters of unconventional warfare.

role.name: Specialist
role.description: Specialist Rule breakers and masters of unconventional warfare.

abilities.name: Rock-It! Turret
abilities.description: Creates a turret that deals 62 damage. Lasts for 30 seconds. Stores up to 2 charges.

abilities.name: Deth Lazor
abilities.description: Charged attack that deals 137 damage to enemies in a line. Damage and range increase the longer the Ability is charged, up to 100% after 3 seconds. Deth Lazor can be channeled indefinitely.

abilities.name: Xplodium Charge
abilities.description: Places a bomb that deals 233 damage to enemies within target area after 2.5 seconds, stunning them for 1.75 seconds.

heroics.name: Robo-Goblin
heroics.description: Activate to gain 30 Armor and 30% Movement Speed for 4 seconds. Passive: Basic Attacks deal 100% bonus damage.

heroics.name: Grav-O-Bomb 3000
heroics.description: After a 2 second delay, pull enemies toward the center of an area and deal 251 damage.

original.name: Gazlowe
original.title: Boss of Ratchet
original.description: Few would consider Gazlowe a fighter, but what he lacks in height, he makes up in mechanical know-how. Besides, you don't get to be boss of a "boom"-town like Ratchet with just a charming personality, if you know what I mean.
original.shortDescription: A Summoner that specializes in controlling key areas of the battleground.

baseHeroInfo.name: Gazlowe
baseHeroInfo.title: Boss of Ratchet

baseHeroInfo.shortDescription: A Summoner that specializes in controlling key areas of the battleground.

role.name: Specialist
role.description: Specialist Rule breakers and masters of unconventional warfare.

trait.name: Salvager
trait.description: Destroyed enemy Structures and Rock-it! Turrets drop Scrap. Collecting Scrap restores 30 Mana and causes Abilities to recharge three times as fast over 3 seconds. Activate Salvager to dismantle a target Rock-it! Turret and turn it into Scrap.

abilities.description: Creates a turret that deals 62 damage. Lasts for 30 seconds. Stores up to 2 charges.

abilities.description: Charged attack that deals 137 damage to enemies in a line. Damage and range increase the longer the Ability is charged, up to 100% after 3 seconds. Deth Lazor can be channeled indefinitely.

abilities.name: Xplodium Charge
abilities.description: Places a bomb that deals 233 damage to enemies within target area after 2.5 seconds, stunning them for 1.75 seconds.

abilities.name: Focus Turrets!
abilities.description: Orders any nearby Rock-It! Turrets to focus the target.

skins.name: Boss of Ratchet
skins.description: Few would consider Gazlowe a fighter, but what he lacks in height, he makes up in mechanical know-how. Besides, you don't get to be boss of a "boom"-town like Ratchet with just a charming personality, if you know what I mean.

skins.name: Chief Engineer Gazlowe
skins.description: A wise man once said, "If it ain't broke, don't fix it." Gazlowe has never heard of this man... and if he had, he might punch him in the gut for saying stuff like that.

skins.name: Mad Martian Gazlowe
skins.description: From the martian landscape, Gazlowe gazed upon the Earth with jealous eyes. Soon that glittering sapphire would be his... but first, Super Sonya must be dealt with.

skins.name: Big Top Gazlowe
skins.description: So they think Gazlowe and Gallywix's Splendiferous Extravaganza has lost its edge, huh? Yeah, well... I got a new act in mind... This one'll knock 'em dead. Guaranteed.
